column1: You receive an email from a tech company you’ve never heard of. Your chance of success is determined by your ability to make a sixty second Blip promoting their product for streamers. If you succeed, you will be awarded $150.

You receive a phone call from a social media company you’ve never heard of. Your chance of success is determined by your ability to make a post on their social media platform. If you succeed, you will be awarded $100

You receive an email from an energy drink company known for challenging streamers and influencers to drink dangerous amounts of their product.  Your success depends on your ability to promote their product by participating in this challenge. If you succeed, you will be awarded $200.
